## method Array last

```typescript
const a = {}
const b = {}
const c = {}
const array = [a, b, c]
const lastElement = array.last() // c
```

## method Array.remove

```typescript
const a = {}
const b = {}
const c = {}
const array = [a, b, c]
const isRemoved = array.remove(a)
// isRemoved - true
// array - [b, c]

```
